thread.title: Launch of brand new service by Easybook - Online Ferry Tickets from Singapore to Bintan
thread.title_full: Launch of brand new service by Easybook - Online Ferry Tickets from Singapore to Bintan

author: prbuzz.com
title: Launch of brand new service by Easybook - Online Ferry Tickets from Singapore to Bintan
text:
Easybook proudly announces the launch of online ferry tickets from Singapore to Bintan . This brand new service introduced by the online ticketing portal has taken its success to an altogether distinct level. Booking ferry tickets from Easybook is as easy as booking bus or train tickets.
Customers now can experience an entertaining trip on a ferry, that too very easily. Your ferry tickets are now just a click away. Easybook with ease offers you Bintan Resort Ferry tickets to all customers who are thinking of experiencing a thoroughly exhilarating ferry trip to Bintan from Singapore.
The ferry ride from Singapore to Bintan takes about one year and the ferries leave from the Tanah Merah Ferry Terminal in Singapore. There are daily to and for ferry departures to Bintan from Singapore. If you want to escape the bustles of the hurry and haste of Singapore, you simply need to log on to Easybook and book your trip. Easybook in association with Bintan Resort Ferries provides ferry services.
Easybook.com provides online ferry tickets at great prices and sometimes offers unbelievable discounts and cash paybacks from time to time. Moreover, you do not need to wait for hours at the ferry ticket counter when you have Easybook.com at your disposal.
Easybook has been providing online ticketing services since years and is the most successful online ticket booking portal today. With the introduction of online ferry tickets, it has become lot more easier for the customers and has made it even more popular.
James Thomas
